item.title: Muggle Medicine: Could Their 'Scalpels' Finally Conquer Spattergroit?
item.description:
By Elara Quirke, Healer Extraordinaire (and Secret Muggle Tech Enthusiast)

The Ministry of Magic has long held aâ€¦ shall we say, cautious view of Muggle technology. From Arthur Weasley’s hilarious (and occasionally hazardous) attempts to understand plugs, to the outright dismissal of ’non-magical solutions’ by certain, ahem, Pure-blood families (Lucius Malfoy, we’re looking at you!), the prevailing attitude has been one of skepticism. However, whispers are now emerging from St. Mungo’s that a radical new approach is being quietly explored: incorporating Muggle medical advancements into our healing practices.
